contents.name: welcome.txt
contents.contents: Hi all, welcome to my website! It's based off a bash terminal, sorry zsh fanboys. My name is Liam O'Flynn, and I'm a tech enthusiast in the San Francisco Bay Area, and I currently work as CTO at YingaTech, UK, Ltd. and, of course, for myself. Check out ~/links/github to see some of my personal projects. This website will serve as a hub for my personal projects, general information, and a blog at some point.

contents.name: YingaTech
contents.description: My company's website. I switch proejcts within it pretty often, and hold the position of CTO.

contents.name: GitHub
contents.description: My github page. Most of my personal projects go here.

contents.name: MAL
contents.description: My MAL profile, I like sharing my opinions

contents.name: KingdomMaps
contents.description: An interactive, historical timeline of the world (help wanted, check repo)

contents.name: Tri-Valley Buses app
contents.description: Buses app, tracks locations of Wheels buses

contents.name: skills.txt
contents.contents: I'm a full stack developer, but love to step outside my comfort zone and try out new frameworks or languages. I consider myself fluent in Python, HTML/CSS,JavaScript, and, while I avoid it if possible, PHP. I work a bit with C and Go on occasion.

contents.name: contact.txt
contents.contents: I don't use social media, but feel free to contact me at lpoflynn (at) airmail (dot) cc. My PGP can be found at ~/links/pgp.txt
